edu.rit.crst

Interface FunctionKernel

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Kernel

    public interface FunctionKernel
extends Kernel
    Interface FunctionKernel specifies the interface for a GPU kernel function that evaluates a cryptographic Function on a series of inputs.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void evaluateFunction(int NA, int Asize, GpuIntArray A, int NB, int Bsize, GpuIntArray B, int R, int Csize, GpuIntArray C)
      Evaluate the cryptographic function for all combinations of inputs.

      • Methods inherited from interface edu.rit.gpu.Kernel

        setBlockDim, setBlockDim, setBlockDim, setCacheConfig, setDynamicSharedMemorySize, setGridDim, setGridDim, setGridDim

    • Method Detail

      • evaluateFunction

        void evaluateFunction(int NA,
                    int Asize,
                    GpuIntArray A,
                    int NB,
                    int Bsize,
                    GpuIntArray B,
                    int R,
                    int Csize,
                    GpuIntArray C)
        Evaluate the cryptographic function for all combinations of inputs. The evaluateFunction() kernel function is called with a 1-D grid of 1-D blocks.
        Parameters:
        NA - Number of A inputs.
        Asize - A input bigint size in words.
        A - Array of A input values.
        NB - Number of B inputs.
        Bsize - B input bigint size in words.
        B - Array of B input values.
        R - Number of rounds.
        Csize - C output bigint size in words.
        C - 3-D array of C output values.
